title: Application for volunteering at a nursing home

content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You will have a conversation with Chen Lixin, the activity director of a nursing home, about your application for volunteering at the nursing home. Prompt 1
